pages.text: $(li)Grizzly Bears are defensive creatures that can be found in the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/grass/forest)Forests$(/l) of the Overworld.$(br)$(li)They can be tamed feeding them with a $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/honeycomb)Honeycomb$(/l) by dropping it on the ground.$(br)$(li)After that you have to feed them with a $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/raw_salmon)Raw Salmon$(/l), by throwing it on the ground, repeat this process a few times.
They will attack you if you get too close or attack them.

$(li)Tamed Grizzly Bears can be made to sit, wander or follow.$(br)$(li)Grizzly bears will defend its owner from attackers of a hostile creature, they even can attack while their owner is riding them.$(br)$(li)These animals can sometimes be seen rummanging throught $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/bee_nest)Bee Nests$(/l) to find $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/honeycomb)Honeycomb$(/l) for consumption.
$(li)These animals can be ridden without the need of a $(l:patchouli:pets/vanilla/saddle)Saddle$(/l) but they are slow and cannot jump.
